Actions.Text: REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS
REFERRED TO INVESTIGATIONS AND GOVERNMENT OPERATIONS

Title: Relates to establishing the banking bill of rights
Summary: Relates to establishing the banking bill of rights; includes due process requirements regarding applications for or closure of credit and deposit accounts and penalties for noncompliance.
LawCode: Add ยง296-b, amd ยง296-a, Exec L; amd ยง9-d, Bank L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the executive law and the banking law, in relation to establishing the banking bill of rights
